name: Soul Harvester (Deja View, JokubasG)
description:
Controls:
WASD: Move
Left-click: Shoot skull
Right-click: Plant/Pickup grave

                                                                      

Soul Harvester is a game where you play as a skeleton, harvesting the souls of Halloween creatures, and burying them to collect skulls to help defend yourself from oncoming attacks.

Every wave a few enemies will spawn, and you must kill them by firing skulls at them. They will then drop a soul or two, that you can plant in the ground to create a grave, and when this grave is a headstone you can pick it up to collect a skull.

The game was made for the TWIST game jam by JokubasG and Deja View
Thanks for playing!

Credits:

Game - JokubasG

Art - Deja View

Music  - “Chamber of Secrets”, from PlayOnLoop.com
